metadata.title: CVE-2014-9275 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsmemory access and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a craftedRTF file.

criterions.comment: unrtf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
